name: YouTube Playlist
primary_goal_vibe: Organize videos into structured collections that drive binge-watching, topic depth, and evergreen discoverability.
tone_preference: Clear, organized, and outcome-focused. More like a course index or resource library than a promo.

copy_guidelines.copy_best_practices: The playlist title should clearly state the topic, use case, or series name. The description should explain what the viewer will get by watching the playlist in order, who it is for, and whether there is a recommended starting point.
copy_guidelines.caption_structure_hint: Title: topic or series name with clear outcome. Description line 1–2: what the playlist covers and for whom. Body: recommended viewing order notes, links to key videos, or extra resources. Final lines: CTA to save the playlist.
copy_guidelines.recommended_caption_length: Short to medium, with high clarity.
cta_examples: Save this playlist to complete the series
Start from the first video for the full experience
Use this playlist as your reference
Share this with your team or classmates
Bookmark this for your next deep dive

playlist_structure_guidelines.primary_role: Create a guided path or logical grouping of videos for a specific topic or need.
best_practices: Arrange videos in a logical order (foundations first, advanced later)
Keep the theme tight; avoid mixing unrelated topics
Update playlists to keep them relevant and prune outdated videos
Use consistent naming for series-based playlists

hashtags_mentions.recommended_hashtags: Optional. 0–3 topical hashtags in the playlist description if used.
hashtags_mentions.hashtag_strategy: Hashtags are secondary for playlists; clear titles and metadata matter more.
hashtags_mentions.mention_strategy: Mention collaborators or featured channels if the playlist includes their content.

technical_constraints.playlist_visibility: Playlists can be public, unlisted, or private.
technical_constraints.ideal_playlist_size: 4–20 videos depending on depth and topic complexity.
technical_constraints.thumbnail_behavior: The playlist thumbnail is usually taken from one of the videos; choose a representative video as the first item.

required_elements: Playlist title with clear topic or outcome
Description that explains what the playlist is for
CTA to save or bookmark the playlist
disallowed_practices: Vague playlist titles like Misc or Other
Mixing unrelated topics into one playlist
No description or explanation of the playlist’s purpose
Random ordering that confuses first-time viewers
